verbs.description: For [ARGM-TMP: all the times] [ARG0: I] [V: criticize] [ARG1: cable news] [ARG2: for its sins] , it is an absolute pleasure to watch MSNBC report , critique and challenge the Trump administration ’s “ zero - tolerance ” policy of separating parents and children from families that had come seeking asylum at the Texas border .
